title: Money Perspective
subtitle: From Medium of Exchange to Store of Value
introduction: Bitcoin is first and foremost a monetary innovation. Understanding the nature of money, its historical evolution, and economic functions is the starting point for understanding Bitcoin's value proposition.

sections.title: The Nature of Money: Evolution of Medium of Exchange

content.subtitle: Core Functions of Money
points: Medium of Exchange: Facilitates exchange of goods and services, solving the double coincidence of wants problem
Unit of Account: Provides a unified pricing unit for comparing value of goods
Store of Value: Preserves purchasing power over time, hedging against inflation
Standard of Deferred Payment: Pricing standard for debts and contracts

content.subtitle: Characteristics of Good Money
points: Durability: Resistant to decay or damage
Divisibility: Can be divided into small units
Portability: Easy to transport and transfer

keyInsights: Bitcoin is the first absolutely scarce digital asset in human history
The value of money comes from social consensus, not government backing
Technological progress is changing the physical and social attributes of money

books.title: The Bitcoin Standard
books.author: Saifedean Ammous
books.description: Understanding Bitcoin from an Austrian Economics perspective

reflectionQuestions: If money becomes completely decentralized, how will the role of government change?
In the digital age, does physical scarcity still matter?
Can Bitcoin function as both a medium of exchange and store of value?
